where 1>100
or PLANID = #{planId}
or objtype = #{objtype}
or class = #{clz}
or (mjd >= #{mjdMin} and mjd <= #{mjdMax})
or (ra >= #{raMin} and ra <= #{raMax})
or (fithas.dec >= #{decMin} and fithas.dec <= #{decMax})
or (sn_u >= #{snuMin} and sn_u <= #{snuMax})
or (sn_g >= #{sngMin} and sn_g <= #{sngMax})
or (sn_r >= #{snrMin} and sn_r <= #{snrMax})
or (sn_i >= #{sniMin} and sn_i <= #{sniMax})
or (sn_z >= #{snzMin} and sn_z <= #{snzMax})
or (z >= #{zMin} and z <= #{zMax})
